text: Asamoah Gyan ( ; born 22 November 1985) is a Ghanaian former professional footballer who played as a striker. A striker who mainly plays the role of first striker, Asamoah is a quick and agile player who proves to be particularly dangerous on the counterattack and in the open field. He has a good feeling with goals thanks to his ability to choose the right timing of insertion and his skill precision. He is widely considered to be one of the best Ghanaian and African strikers of all time. On May 11, 2024, Gyan participated in the All Regional Game Torch Relay in Tamale , Ghana. In a message shared on his social media, Gyan expressed his support for the initiative, encouraging the youth to engage in sports. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club,
